alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; East Laramie County; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 1:53PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...Strong outflow winds will impact portions of Laramie County through 230 PM MDT... At 152 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong outflow winds along a line extending from 8 miles northeast of Whitaker to near Cheyenne to near Rockport. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cheyenne, Pine Bluffs, Burns, Albin, South Greeley, Hillsdale, Ranchettes, Warren AFB, Frontier Park, Whitaker, North Cheyenne, Warren Af Base, Meriden Rest Area, Gun Barrel, Carpenter, Fox Farm-College and South Greeley High. This includes the following highways... Interstate 25 in Wyoming between mile markers 1 and 40. Interstate 80 in Wyoming between mile markers 357 and 402. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie County; East Laramie County; South Laramie Range Foothills
